answers.answer: Is this a new problem or have you never had any sensation during orgasm?  If the former, it may be the result of thin layers of scar tissue building up over time; if the layers get thick enough, penile sensation is affected.  You might try a high quality penis nutrient cream (health professionals recommend Man1 Man Oil).  Look for one with acetyl L carnitine; that supplement is neuroprotective and can help enhance penis sensitivity.

Do you have diabetes or a glucose intolerance?Having a condition like diabetes when the sugar levels in the body are not controlled properly can lead to nerve damage and this in turn affects sensations of touch.If you have not been tested for diabetes, it may be a good idea to get this done by a HbA1C blood test.  This give the percentage of sugar levels over a 12 week period.Make an appointment with your doctor to discuss this with him to find out if there is an underlying medical problem.Best wishes.

question: no feeling of senasation during organism
title: no sensation during organism
